column5: Headed down river today to try the 18fow, got set up around 6:45 am, had 1 good hit and missed it ...Damn, I can't hook a Walleye this year ... Around 10:00am I decided to add a couple small hooks above my Buckshot with Spikes, it was non stop Smelt. I fished right off bottom and was hauling in 2 Smelt at a time ...around 11:00am I called it a day with about 200 or so SMELT ...I saw 2 Walleye  on the ice today on the way back in...  If you would like to get the Kids out for some fun and fast action head out in the Marina or the River as it's packed full of Smelt ...
Boy would I love to get into a day of smelt fishing like that!  Beautiful!!!!!!!
They will be here till Spring till the Big Cats chase them outa here ...take the drive down for the day Smelts Galore ....
Great report and pics Fishmaster  Looks like a fun action time out there... congratulations and thanks for sharing Leechman
It would be about a three hour drive from here but I just might do it in the near future, I'd like to get to meet you anyway one day soon.
oh man thats making me drool
They are tastey Little Fishes ...all ya need is a little oil in a pan batter them with Flour and sat and peper cook till golden brown and enjoy ...
Smelts next weekend. Can anyone in the Oshawa area say road trip? PM me if you can.
